Description: A nitrogen-rich fertilizer ideal for promoting rapid growth.
Application Guidelines: Apply during early growth stages, evenly distributed.
Expected Yield Improvement: 10-15% increase in yield under optimal conditions.

Description: Diammonium Phosphate, rich in phosphorus for root development.
Application Guidelines: Apply at planting time, mix well with soil.
Expected Yield Improvement: 5-10% increase in yield under optimal conditions.

Description: A balanced N-P-K fertilizer for overall growth.
Application Guidelines: Apply during planting and early growth stages.

Description: A balanced fertilizer for mid-season growth.
Application Guidelines: Apply in mid-season to support growth.

Description: A balanced fertilizer for maintaining soil nutrient levels.
A balanced N-P-K fertilizer for moderate growth.
A fertilizer high in phosphorus and potassium for fruiting stages.
